rcw 0.0.0.9000
  • Example
    • chartConfig
  • Reference

Function for creating chart configurations.

create_config.Rd

create_config creates configuration lists using

create_query_url to build the SDMX query URLs

create_config(sdmx_data_query = stop("'sdmx_data_query' must be specified"),
  data_api_endpoint = "https://stats.oecd.org/SDMX-JSON/data",
  path = NULL, title = NULL, subtitle = NULL, source_url = NULL,
  source_label = NULL, highlight = NULL, baseline = NULL,
  chart_dimension = NULL, display = "label", width = NULL,
  height = NULL, x_axis = NULL, y_axis = NULL, logo = TRUE,
  owner = TRUE, language = "en",
  type = stop("'type' must be specified"))


  create_query_url(sdmx_data_query = stop("'sdmx_data_query' must be provided"),
  data_api_endpoint = stop("'data_api_endpoint' must be provided"))

Arguments

sdmx_data_query

complete SDMX URL, e.g. ""KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?startTime=2015&endTime=2015"
data_api_endpoint

SDMX API URL, e.g. http://stats.oecd.org/SDMX-JSON/data
path

path to a JSON template that can be read using jsonlite::fromJSON
title

character string main title of chart
subtitle

character vector chart subtitle
source_url

character string to add URL below chart
source_label

character string to show instead of URL below chart
highlight

a list of character vectors respecting the order of dimensions of the SDMX data flow
baseline

a list of character vectors respecting the order of dimensions of the SDMX data flow
chart_dimension

list of id, x, y and mode
width

integer chart width in pixel
height

integer chart height in pixel
logo

logical include logo
owner

logical include copyright information
language

character string, one of en or fr
type

one of BarChart, RowChart, ScatterChart, HSymbolChart, VSymbolChart, TimelineChart, StackedBarChart

Source

jsonlite was created by Jeroen Ooms et al., see https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/jsonlite/index.html.

Examples

query <- "KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?startTime=2015&endTime=2015"
chartconfig <- create_config(sdmx_data_query = query, type = "BarChart")
str(chartconfig)
#> List of 3
#>  $ data :List of 3
#>   ..$ data   :List of 6
#>   .. ..$ title    : NULL
#>   .. ..$ subtitle : NULL
#>   .. ..$ footnotes:List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ source     : NULL
#>   .. .. ..$ sourceLabel: NULL
#>   .. ..$ frequency: NULL
#>   .. ..$ series   : list()
#>   .. ..$ share    :List of 4
#>   .. .. ..$ focused       :List of 2
#>   .. .. .. ..$ highlight: list()
#>   .. .. .. ..$ baseline : list()
#>   .. .. ..$ chartDimension: NULL
#>   .. .. ..$ display       : chr "label"
#>   .. .. ..$ source        : chr "https://stats.oecd.org/SDMX-JSON/data/KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?st"| __truncated__
#>   ..$ options:List of 2
#>   .. ..$ base:List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ width : NULL
#>   .. .. ..$ height: NULL
#>   .. ..$ axis:List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ x:List of 1
#>   .. .. .. ..$ linear: Named list()
#>   .. .. ..$ y:List of 1
#>   .. .. .. ..$ linear: Named list()
#>   ..$ config :List of 4
#>   .. ..$ logo         : chr "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/sco/0/0d/OECD_logo_new.svg"
#>   .. ..$ owner        : chr "©OECD"
#>   .. ..$ terms        :List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ label: chr "Terms & Conditions"
#>   .. .. ..$ link : chr "https://www.oecd.org/termsandconditions/"
#>   .. ..$ sourceHeaders:List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ Accept         : chr "application/vnd.sdmx.data+json"
#>   .. .. ..$ Accept-Language: chr "en"
#>  $ share: chr "latest"
#>  $ type : chr "BarChart"

## using custom template
jsonfile <- system.file("templates/default.json", package = "rcw")
chartconfig2 <- create_config(sdmx_data_query = query, type = "BarChart", path = jsonfile)
str(chartconfig2)
#> List of 3
#>  $ data :List of 3
#>   ..$ data   :List of 6
#>   .. ..$ title    : NULL
#>   .. ..$ subtitle : NULL
#>   .. ..$ footnotes:List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ source     : NULL
#>   .. .. ..$ sourceLabel: NULL
#>   .. ..$ frequency: NULL
#>   .. ..$ series   : list()
#>   .. ..$ share    :List of 4
#>   .. .. ..$ focused       :List of 2
#>   .. .. .. ..$ highlight: list()
#>   .. .. .. ..$ baseline : list()
#>   .. .. ..$ chartDimension: NULL
#>   .. .. ..$ display       : chr "label"
#>   .. .. ..$ source        : chr "https://stats.oecd.org/SDMX-JSON/data/KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?st"| __truncated__
#>   ..$ options:List of 2
#>   .. ..$ base:List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ width : NULL
#>   .. .. ..$ height: NULL
#>   .. ..$ axis:List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ x:List of 1
#>   .. .. .. ..$ linear: Named list()
#>   .. .. ..$ y:List of 1
#>   .. .. .. ..$ linear: Named list()
#>   ..$ config :List of 4
#>   .. ..$ logo         : chr "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/sco/0/0d/OECD_logo_new.svg"
#>   .. ..$ owner        : chr "©OECD"
#>   .. ..$ terms        :List of 2
#>   .. .. ..$ label: chr "Terms & Conditions"
#>   .. .. ..$ link : chr "https://www.oecd.org/termsandconditions/"

#>   .. .. ..$ Accept         : chr "application/vnd.sdmx.data+json"
#>   .. .. ..$ Accept-Language: chr "en"
#>  $ share: chr "latest"
#>  $ type : chr "BarChart"

query <- "KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?startTime=2015&endTime=2015"
create_query_url(sdmx_data_query = query,
                 data_api_endpoint = "http://stats.oecd.org:80/SDMX-JSON/data")
#> [1] "http://stats.oecd.org:80/SDMX-JSON/data/KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?startTime=2015&endTime=2015&dimensionAtObservation=AllDimensions"
